Class PersonAdminService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.demo.personaladmin.service.impl.PersonAdminService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPersonAdminService

    public class PersonAdminService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPersonAdminService
    员工人事管理的实现，用于封装增加和修改员工信息等操作

    daming
